title: Navigate forwards to a switch that is off
instructions: Starting at the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Living Room Lights' switch.

title: Navigate backwards to a switch that is off
instructions: Starting at the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Living Room Lights' switch.

title: Navigate forwards to a switch that is on
instructions: Starting at the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Living Room Lights' switch.

title: Navigate backwards to a switch that is on
instructions: Starting at the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Living Room Lights' switch.

title: Request information about a switch that is off
instructions: Starting at the 'Living Room Lights' switch, read information about the switch.

title: Request information about a switch that is on
instructions: Starting at the 'Living Room Lights' switch, read information about the switch.

title: Operate a switch that is off
instructions: Starting at the 'Living Room Lights' switch, change its state to 'on'.

title: Operate a switch that is on
instructions: Starting at the 'Living Room Lights' switch, change its state to 'off'.
